title: Monster Hunter Skins?
body:
I can't help but notice the resemblance between the Beast Hunter skins and armors/weapons of Monster Hunter! I think that's a cool relationship as Monster Hunter is one of my favorite game series. Anyone else think the same?

Sejuani:
http://imgur.com/tPVE2Ec

http://imgur.com/LkMvdnv
http://imgur.com/kh7CAf6
http://imgur.com/sdQbEHy

Tryndamere:
http://imgur.com/tB9IcoW

http://imgur.com/x00K2oH
http://imgur.com/sH0ygMv
http://imgur.com/Wf3cbcJ

Similarities also exist for Draven.

replies.body: Monster Hunter was definitely an inspiration for these particular skins. ^-^

> Bloodborne/Dark Souls skins when?

YES! Money flew out of my pocket. Now I have to go chase it down, thanks :P

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=j8gMPq3V,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-14T21:57:29.610+0000)
>
> Monster Hunter was definitely an inspiration for these particular skins. ^-^

Sorry I'm late to the game, but you don't know how exciting it is to see 2 of my favorite games (LoL and MH franchise) come together :)  Thanks for having fun and bringing some nostalgia I can get behind to LoL.

Little sad when I found out they weren't 975 but then I thought back to MH and how there aren't really any special effects for combat. But hey, a lower price and I think I finally found the Sejuani skin I've been waiting for <3 (will still swap between poro rider and traditional)

Haha, yeah. We didn't want to force particles on something that didn't warrant them. We thought similarly that the combat particles weren't crazy, and that the base particles for these champions worked pretty well, especially since Draven's particles 'change' because of the model's weapon change. (Quality of life on those and his ground decal). 

Glad to see you've found a Sej skin you're excited for! Poro Rider will forever be my favorite. ^-^

These skins are not worth spending $10.00.   Sorry.

My first thought, yeah. Only had MH4U, and it's been a while since I've played, but I can't help but feel like Draven's armor reminds me of the Kecha Wacha set in some regard. Might just be me though, because I really liked that armor. Besides 'Orange and sort-of-blue' color scheme with a vest, there's probably not much resemblance.
